column6: As old threats are still having their effects, new, more deadly threats emerge from the unlikeliest of places. Threats that spell doom for the X-Men. Plus, what could possibly strike terror into the heart of...Sabretooth!?
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | writer:Mike Carey | colorist:Antonio Fabela | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Tim Townsend
